titles.title: A bill to remove the use restrictions on certain land transferred to Rockingham County, Virginia, and for other purposes.
A bill to remove the use restrictions on certain land transferred to Rockingham County, Virginia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 114-496.

bill.summary: Amends federal law authorizing Rockingham County, Virginia, to use specified land transferred by the United States for a child care center to remove that use restriction.
